title: Choujuu Kishin Dancougar: God Bless Dancougar (God Bless Dancougar)
synopsis: After destroying the Zorbados Empire, the Jyusenki-tai/Cyber Beast Force has expanded and are training new recruits. But after failing to stop a monster that seems to be a remnant of the Zorbados Empire from destroying a city, the CBF is thrown in jail. Now the CBF have to escape from jail and find out what was behind the monster they fought.
related_anime: ['Choujuu Kishin Dancougar: Ushinawareta Mono-tachi e no Requiem', 'Choujuu Kishin Dancougar: Hakunetsu no Shuushou']
staff: [['Sonoda, Hideki', ['Script']], ['Kana', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nakazaki, Hideya', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['Key Animation']]]
